titleStmt.title: Cleopatra a new romance / written originally in French by the fam'd author of Cassandra and now Englished by a gent. of the Inner-Temple.
Cléopatre. English. Part 1-2
titleStmt.author: La Calprenède, Gaultier de Coste, seigneur de, d. 1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley ..., and John Holden ...,

notesStmt.note: A translation of parts 1 and 2 of La Calprenède's Cléopâtre.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
